name: Reddit: Fix Font for Unicode Characters
description:
Changes the default fonts of Reddit so Unicode characters display correctly (basically, it removes those weird boxes/squares/rectangles).
Unicode characters are often used to create ASCII images and different text faces (examples on textfac.es)
so ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) doesn't look like (▯° ͜ʖ ͡°)
